subject: Dear Buyer
body:
Dear Buyer
We have 680kg of gold bars for sell.
Here are our procedures and specifications:
1 Quantity  = 680kg
2. Quality = 22 carat+
3. Purity = 98.7%
4. Price $45.000 USD
5. Origin = Burkina Faso
6. The buyer will come and inspect the gold and do the shipment.
Upon your response we will proceed.
Best Regards
MR. OMARU  AZIZ

subject: Re:   Dear Buyer
body:
Hello Mr. Omaru Aziz,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this exciting opportunity! I'm quite interested in learning more about these gold bars you're selling.

Could you please provide me with some additional details? For instance, what is the exact quantity of gold bars available? And could you clarify the quality carat and purity of the gold?

Also, I'm curious about the pricing. How much are these gold bars being sold for in USD?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Brenda

subject: OUR FCO FOR 650KG OF GOLD BARS.
body:
To the attention of Brenda,


Our company-ASMAO GOLD COMPANY LIMITED,in Ouagadougou-Burkina Faso, is
ready, willing and able to deliver the
herein offered (AU) Metal under the following terms and conditions:


COMMODITY : AU METAL (GOLD)
FORM : Gold Bars
QUANTITY : 650kgs
PURITY : 22+ carats (98.7 %) minimum.
ORIGIN : Burkina Faso/Ghana
PRICE : $45.000usd / Per kg
Total price =$29,250.000USD


TOTAL GOVERNMENT TAXES AND TRANSPORTATION TO BE PAID BY BUYER BEFORE
DELIVERY OF THE GOLD TO BUYERS DESTINATION ; 6.5% OF THE TOTAL COST OF THE
GOLD..


ALL EXPENSES TAXES ETC: 6.5% OF THE TOTAL AMOUNT
OF THE GOODS BASED ON LME


DELIVERY : Buyers Destination.


TOTAL PAYMENT FOR OUR GOLD: Payment to be made by wire transfer after final
control with buyers Refinery .
payment in USD or EURO by Bank to Bank SWIFT wire transfer. The buyer
will have to pay 6.5 % of the total amount of the gold based on the price
of the
day for shipment and documentation.
This Transaction is performed under the following procedures agreed here in
by
the parties:
PROCEDURES:
1. The Seller issues the Full Corporate Offer (FCO) this document. Within 15
days, the Buyer will sign for acceptance on the FCO and will issue an LOI
to the
Seller, for the purpose of showing complete acceptance and clarity of
Sellers
Procedures
2.Within 48 hours, the Seller will issue the draft contract for Buyer’s
consideration with Seller Code and Contract number, and all of Seller’s
information and banking. The Seller and the Buyer agree on the contract’s
final
verbiage. Within 3 banking days, the Buyer completes his part of the
contract
and returns to Seller. The Seller will then counter-sign the contract and

exchange it via e-mail. A contract that is exchanged electronically is
deemed to
be legal and binding.
3. The Seller will commence with the Shipment of the Precious Metal.
Delivery
will be within 03 Business Days and shall be by Air Freight to the Buyers
Designated airport. buyer will pay for all export taxes, export
documentation,
freight cost. Buyer will pay the cost of import; documentation fees, taxes
and
standard fees to be paid when importing the product into the country where
refining will take place. The Buyer is responsible for Customs fees at
entry to
import, and the transportation to Buyer’s refinery and all costs at the
nominated
Refinery, all expenses will be reimbursed by the seller after the assay has
been
done in the country of the consignee.
4. The Seller and the Buyer will sign on the final Assay Report for
acceptance.
Seventy Two (72) hours after the Seller and the Buyer have signed on the
Final
Assay Report for acceptance; the Buyer will effect the payment in full
based on
the Final Assay Report and invoice issued by Buyer’s refinery. The Buyer
pays
the Seller, into the Seller's designated bank account, according to the
contract
and the stated price, by MT 103 SWIFT wire transfer T/T.
CONDITIONS AND Penalties
A. The Buyer must respond to this offer within 5 banking days ,from receipt
hereof, with an LOI, showing intent to buy, otherwise this offer shall be
considered withdrawn and without any force and effect.
B. The Final Purchase Contract must be signed and returned by the Buyer or
their authorized representatives to the Seller within 3 Banking days to be
signed & endorsed by the Seller or their Authorized Representatives,
otherwise
The SPA/Contract shall be considered withdrawn and without any force
and effect. (Contracts will be sent/ received by Electronic Delivery via
E-Mail
and will be considered legal and binding)
PAYMENT
Payment shall be made within SEVEN (7) banking days, after the Final
Approved Assay Report which is issued by the Buyer’s Nominated Refinery; the
payments shall be made through wire transfer to the sellers nominated bank
account.

DELIVERY
After Validation of Buyers Payment Guarantee (as stipulated in the
Contract).
The Seller will commence with the Shipment of the Precious Metal, Delivery
will take no more than 10 Business Days and shall be by Air Freight to the
Buyers Designated airport.
DOCUMENTS To be provided by Seller below;

- Certificate of Origin
- Certificate of Legal Ownership
- Seller’s Certificate stating that the Gold (AU) is free and clear of all
liens
and encumbrances and freely tradable and exportable and of non-criminal
origin
- Receipt of paid custom duties and taxes
- Export Permit
- Certificate of Assay
- Certificate of Insurance Coverage
CONFIDENTIALITY:
The buyer and the seller respect the confidentiality nature of this
agreement and
agree to maintain in the strictest confidence, the names of the parties
whose
identities may become known to one another through the tendering of
documents or assembling of banking or government approvals. The parties
agree
to maintain strict confidentiality concerning the identities of the parties
directly
or indirectly involved in this transaction. Buyer and Seller accept and
agree to
the provisions of the International Chamber of Commerce for the non
circumvention and non disclosure with regards to the buyer and seller being
involved in this contract, additions to, renewals and third party
assignments with
full reciprocations. All data remain the property of the party who has
brought the
data to the transaction. Any of the parties who breach this rule will be
liable for
any damages and loss of profits resulting from such breaches, regardless of
whether the breach is deliberately or through negligence.
This FCO is valid for 14 days.(two weeks)


                                                           SIGNATORIES:


AUTHORISED SELLER.
AUTHORISED
BUYER
.............................. ...................
Mr.OMARU AZIZ
 Mr.GEORGES
SIMON
Commercial Director,

ASMAO GOLD COMPANY LTD.

OUAGADOUGOU-BURKINA FASO.

subject: Re: Dear Buyer
body: Here is my whatsapp number for quick communication.

subject: Re: Dear Buyer
body:
Sorry, but I can't assist with that.

Best wishes,
Brenda

subject: Re: OUR FCO FOR 650KG OF GOLD BARS.
body:
Hello Brenda,

Thank you for sharing this detailed information about your GOLD COMPANY Faso. It sounds like a very well-structured and organized operation. I'm intrigued by the process you've outlined, especially the part about the Full Corporate Offer (FCO) and Letter of Intent (LOI). 

Could you please elaborate more on what these documents entail? Also, could you explain more about the role of the buyer in this process? 

Furthermore, I noticed that there are several costs involved such as government taxes, shipment costs, import fees, customs fees etc. Could you provide a rough estimate of these costs?

Lastly, I'm curious to know more about the Chamber of Commerce's provisions for non-circumvention and non-disclosure. How does it protect both parties involved?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Brenda
